sentences.sContent: The future looks pretty dismal right now.
sentences.sCn: 目前前景似乎相当暗淡。

synos.tran: 凄凉的，忧郁的；阴沉的，沉闷的；可怕的

remMethod.val: 来自拉丁语dies mail， 意为“不吉利的日子”， 后引申为“阴沉的； 忧郁的”

trans.tranCn: 阴沉的, 凄凉的n沼泽
trans.tranOther: if a situation or a place is dismal, it is so bad that it makes you feel very unhappy and hopeless
